alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 29 at 5:01AM EDT until July 29 at 8:56PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... The Red River at Clay City, affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...The Flood Warning is for the Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...The Flood Warning is in effect from this afternoon to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch, as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Friday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 17.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage later this afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued by noon.
